mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Tic Tac Toe" and "Traveler's Route" ROUND DANCES "Serenade" and "Lindy Lee" SPECIAL FEATURES "How We Dance in Texas", "Rip 'n' Snort Throws a Party", "Sets in Order 5-year Book", "Accent on Fun", "Asilomar Summer Camps", and "the Square Dance Southern Mountain Style." This edition also includes the The regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square Dance Picture", "Caller of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
